origin: These functions try to compose the given images (or images stored internally from the other function calls) into the final pano under the assumption that the image transformations were estimated before.
local: 这些函数试图将给定的图像（或从其他函数调用内部存储的图像）合成到最终的pano中，前提是图像变换是在之前估计的。

origin: These functions try to match the given images and to estimate rotations of each camera.
local: 这些函数尝试匹配给定的图像并估计每个摄影机的旋转。

origin: These function restors camera rotation and camera intrinsics of each camera that can be got with
local: 这些功能恢复相机旋转和相机内部的每一个相机，可以用

origin: These functions try to stitch the given images.
local: 这些函数尝试缝合给定的图像。

origin: configured in one of the stitching modes.
local: 在其中一种缝合模式下配置。

origin: It's possible to use this class without being aware of the entire stitching pipeline. However, to be able to achieve higher stitching stability and quality of the final images at least being familiar with the theory is recommended.
local: 可以在不知道整个缝合管道的情况下使用此类。但是，为了能够获得更高的拼接稳定性和最终图像的质量，建议至少熟悉该理论。

origin: A basic example on image stitching can be found at opencv_source_code/samples/cpp/stitching.cpp
local: 有关图像拼接的基本示例可以在opencv\u source\u code/samples/cpp/stitching.cpp中找到

origin: A basic example on image stitching in Python can be found at opencv_source_code/samples/python/stitching.py
local: 在opencv\u source\u code/samples/Python/stitching.py中可以找到一个关于Python中图像拼接的基本示例

origin: A detailed example on image stitching can be found at opencv_source_code/samples/cpp/stitching_detailed.cpp
local: 有关图像拼接的详细示例，请访问opencv\u source\u code/samples/cpp/stitching\u detailed.cpp

origin: Mode for creating photo panoramas. Expects images under perspective transformation and projects resulting pano to sphere.
local: 创建照片全景的模式。需要透视变换下的图像，并将生成的全景投影到球体。

origin: Mode for composing scans. Expects images under affine transformation does not compensate exposure by default.
local: 用于合成扫描的模式。默认情况下，仿射变换下的图像不补偿曝光。

origin: Scenario for stitcher operation. This is usually determined by source of images to stitch and their transformation. Default parameters will be chosen for operation in given scenario.
local: 缝纫机操作场景。这通常由要缝合的图像源及其变换决定。将为给定场景中的操作选择默认参数。
